snippet: For the Canadian women’s team, the memory of a call that helped the United States win an Olympic semifinal game is still a fresh wound.
abstract: Women's national soccer teams of Canada and United States will play in match billed as an international friendly; match is friendly in name only, as two teams have developed a bitter rivalry.
lead_paragraph: For the Canadian women’s team, the memory of a call that helped the United States win an Olympic semifinal game is still a fresh wound.

headline.seo: A U.S.-Canada Soccer Friendly With Edgy Overtones
